title: Manzanar National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Roy Takeno editor of the Manzanar Free Press (left) and Yuichi Hirata (center) reading the Los Angeles Times with Nobuo Sawamura (right) in front of the Manzanar Free Press Office. Ansel Adams 1943  Your news source for Manzanar Keep up to date with all the activities going on at Manzanar by reading our News Releases. Do I need a film permit? Breaking news does not require a film permit. Permits are needed for activities beyond a typical visit to the park by a family or individual. Please read carefully all information in applying for Special Use and Filming Permits
